original_text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall: and when he had tasted thereof, he would not drink.
korean_text: 쓸개 탄 포도주를 예수께 주어 마시게 하려 하였더니 예수께서 맛보시고 마시고자 하지 아니하시더라

sentences.original_text: They gave him vinegar to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 마시기 위해 식초를 주었고

sentences.original_text: and when he had tasted thereof
